name: ROCK (loopdeloops)
description:
DETAILS:

ROCK is a game made on scratch

2 player mode is in beta btw

controller edition is currently in beta as well, and has lots of issues

also u cant do 2p mode on controller edition

INSTRUCTIONS:

guide the cat away from the rocks to survive!

CONTROLS:

the cat follows the cursor

in 2p mode, the second player can chose which path for the rock to take using the arrow keys

LINKS:

original scratch game:  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/788395622/

my scratch profile: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/loopdeloops15/

my youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@loopdeloops/videos
